grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 赴任【フニン】moving to a different location to start a new job, (proceeding to) new appointment
赴援【フエン】going to save, reinforcing (e.g. troops)
kun reading compounds: 赴く【おもむく】to go in the direction of, to proceed toward, to proceed according to, to repair to, to betake oneself to, to become, to face (facts, circumstances, etc.), to abide by, to agree to, to consent to, to obey
